developer_view.summary: Requests `Session` object does not verify requests after making first request with verify=False
developer_view.impact: When making requests through a Requests `Session`, if the first request is made with `verify=False` to disable cert verification, all subsequent requests to the same origin will continue to ignore cert verification regardless of changes to the value of `verify`

developer_view.summary: urllib3's Proxy-Authorization request header isn't stripped during cross-origin redirects
developer_view.impact: When using urllib3's proxy support with `ProxyManager`, the `Proxy-Authorization` header is only sent to the configured proxy, as expected

developer_view.summary: urllib3's request body not stripped after redirect from 303 status changes request method to GET
developer_view.impact: urllib3 previously wouldn't remove the HTTP request body when an HTTP redirect response using status 303 "See Other" after the request had its method changed from one that could accept a request body (like `POST`) to `GET` as is required by HTTP RFCs

developer_view.summary: Authorization Header forwarded on redirect
Improper Certificate Validation in urllib3
urllib3 redirects are not disabled when retries are disabled on PoolManager instantiation
developer_view.impact: urllib3 handles redirects and retries using the same mechanism, which is controlled by the `Retry` object

developer_view.summary: Improper Neutralization of CRLF Sequences in urllib3 library for Python
`Cookie` HTTP header isn't stripped on cross-origin redirects
developer_view.impact: urllib3 doesn't treat the `Cookie` HTTP header special or provide any helpers for managing cookies over HTTP, that is the responsibility of the user
